}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "7016A044302a" and "v1.20" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. *The '''[[Freescale]]''' SoC used in this device is P/N P1020NSE2DFB. :It's also marked w/ "533/677 MHZ", "QQLG1112", and "MALAYSIA". :"CK77 94V-0" is silkscreened on the wireless modules. :"P/N: 5816A0474000" and "P/N: 5816A0475000" are printed on the stickers on the first and second module.
The AP is essentially identical to the [[Aerohive HiveAP 350]] besides the antenna configuration :(330 = integral antennas, 350 = external antennas connected via RP-SMA).
Per the FCC manual / QSG... *The default [[Property:Default SSID|default SSID]] pattern is '''AH-XXXXXX_ac''' ('''XXXXXX''' being the last three octets of the wireless interface MAC address [lower case letters]). :The default PSK is specified as '''aerohive'''. *The default login (telnet [<small>''note that the Telnet connection is protected by the WPA2 security mechanisms.'']</small><!-- LOL! --> / SSH) credentials appear to be admin:aerohive. :The [[Property:Default IP address|default IP address]] ''may'' be ''1.1.1.1''.
Per '''WiGLE''', this device may use 08:EA:44 and/or 40:18:B1 OUIs.
{{WiFiCert|WFA12101|06/26/2013}}
{{seealso|Aerohive}}
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/aerohive/aerohive_hiveap-330 |wikipage = |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = |subtarget = |arch = |support_started_version = 18.06.0 |current_supported_version = 21.02.1 |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Freescale]]'' P1020 Dual-core [[PowerPC]] (@533MHz) *Memory: 256MB (SDRAM) DDR2 *Storage: 64MB NOR Flash *Network: 2x Gigabit Ethernet ports *WiFi: 2x [[Atheros]] AR9390 (3T3R 802.11abgn) *USB: 1x USB 2.0 ports *Power: 12V, 0.625A via barrel or 802.3af via eth0
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[http://www.insearchoftech.com/2012/04/05/inside-wireless-hardware-part-2/ Inside Wireless Hardware on '''InSearchofTech''']
